property.name: threads.num
property.description: the threads num of read test

property.name: files.per.thread
property.description: the number of files to read for each read thread

property.name: mode
property.description: the read mode of read test, should be RANDOM or SEQUENCE

property.name: identical
property.description: if true, all the read threads will read the same files

property.name: grain.bytes
property.description: the size of the buffer which is read from Tachyon at once

property.name: read.type
property.description: the ReadType of the read operation
